negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hi Lingyao, thanks for negotiating with me. I propose that I take the 2 hats, and you can have the book and the 3 balls. This way, I would get items worth 6 to me, and you would get items worth 4. Let me know what you think - I'm open to discussing further to find an agreement that works for both of us.
Lingyao replied in round 1: halt negotiation
